trans-unit.source: Contains information about the changes that occur in the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase.TextChanged" /> event.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> object specifies where a change occurred in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> 개체에서 변경이 발생 한 위치를 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A> property specifies the position of the change, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were added, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> property specifies how many symbols were removed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.Offset%2A> 변경의 위치를 지정 하는 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.AddedLength%2A> 속성 추가 된 기호 수를 지정 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange.RemovedLength%2A> 속성 제거 된 기호 수를 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, a symbol is a single character.
trans-unit.target: 변경이 발생 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>, 기호는 단일 문자입니다.

trans-unit.source: When a change occurs in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, a symbol is one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 변경이 발생 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, 기호는 다음 중 하나:

trans-unit.source: An opening or closing tag for a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> element.
trans-unit.target: 여는 태그 또는 닫는 태그가 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextElement> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element contained within an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> or <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 내에 포함 된 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.InlineUIContainer> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that such a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is always counted as exactly one symbol; any additional content or elements contained by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are not counted as symbols.
trans-unit.target: 이러한은 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 항상 정확히 하나의 기호; 추가 내용 또는 요소에 포함 된 것으로 간주 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 기호로 계산 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Each 16-bit [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] character inside of a text <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> element.
trans-unit.target: 각각 16 비트 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_unicode](~/includes/tlasharptla-unicode-md.md)] 텍스트 내부에서 문자 <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Run> 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been added to the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 추가된 기호 수를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been added to the control.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets or sets the position at which the change occurred.
The position at which the change occurred.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets or sets the number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에서 제거된 기호 수를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of symbols that have been removed from the control.
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextChange> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
